snippet.title: Red Faction: Official Battlegrounds Trailer
snippet.description:
The official trailer for the new car battle game Red Faction: Battlegrounds. Get ready for vehicular combat in the Red Faction universe. 

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
